decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the unit restored to its former retail use on or before 27/06/2022.

Condition : 4 - The use of the premises as a pet care and treatment facility shall be limited to the area of the retail unit as illustrated on Drawing 5355/01 Rev E and shall be carried out only whilst the remainder of the unit is in use for the retail sale of pets and pet related products.
Condition : 5 - Upon the cessation of the use hereby approved, the floor space will revert back to Class A1 in accordance with the remainder of the unit.

Condition : 6 - The use hereby approved shall not be carried on outside the hours 8.00am to 8.00pm on Monday to Saturday or 10.00am to 5.00pm Sundays. Delivery times shall not be outside the hours of 8.00am - 6.30pm Monday to Saturday and there shall be no deliveries on Sundays.
description: Retrospective application for temporary change of use of approximately 119 m2 of floor space at the application site from retail (Class A1) to a pet care and treatment facility.
